page.title: 10A Primary School Day
page.content: I was excited when I went to school this morning.We were going up to the 6th form college to do our 'Games'.It's great fun!After assembly,at nine o'clock, we finished our maths then got our games kit.We walked to the college and were having races around the running track in the grounds.The whole class was exhausted when we walked back to school.We had missed morning playtime,which is usually at 10:30,because we come back late.There was 15 minutes till lunch time,we did maths till it was time for lunch at 12 o'clock.After lunch we finished drawing our wild animals.Afternoon break was at 2:15.After break we finished drawing and then composed a poem.School ended at 3:30.
